sections.heading: of tax rolls.The county assessor of any county shall, at any time, correct the tax rolls as provided in section 77-1613
sections.text: 02 for any real property listed on the assessment roll but omitted from the tax roll.SourceLaws 1921, c. 133, art. XI, ยง 6, p. 592;C.S.1922, ยง 5903;C.S.1929, ยง 77-1006;Laws 1939, c
